site_title: Japan Travel Guide | Tokyo Tourism | Best Japan Trip Planner 2025
site_description: Discover Japan with AI-powered travel planning. Complete guide to Tokyo, Yokohama, Saitama & Chiba tourism. Hotels, restaurants, attractions & personalized itineraries for your perfect Japan trip.

hero.title: Plan Your Dream Trip to Japan with AI
hero.subtitle: Get personalized itineraries, hidden gems, and authentic experiences tailored just for you. Start planning in under 60 seconds.

features.title: Why Choose Our Japan Travel Guide

ai_planning.title: AI Travel Planning
ai_planning.description: Get personalized Japan itineraries based on your interests, budget, and travel style. Our AI analyzes thousands of attractions to create your perfect trip.

comprehensive_guide.title: Comprehensive Local Guide
comprehensive_guide.description: Discover hidden gems and popular attractions in Tokyo, Yokohama, Saitama, and Chiba with insider tips from local experts.

real_time.title: Real-Time Information
real_time.description: Access live updates on opening hours, crowd levels, weather conditions, and transportation schedules for seamless travel.

multilingual.title: Your Language, Your Journey
multilingual.description: Available in Japanese, English, Korean, and French. Explore Japan in the language you're comfortable with.

areaGuide.title: Area & Category Guides
areaGuide.description: Explore Tokyo, Yokohama, Saitama, Chiba and more. From popular spots to hidden local favorites, discover each area's unique charm.

userExperience.title: Make It Your Own
userExperience.description: Save favorites, write reviews, create travel logs, and share your experiences. Connect with fellow travelers and build your Japan story.

aiRecommendation.title: Tailored Just for You
aiRecommendation.description: Based on your preferences, budget, and interests, AI crafts the perfect itinerary that matches your travel style.

realTimeInfo.title: Stay Updated
realTimeInfo.description: Check crowd levels, weather, and transport delays in real time to travel smarter.

community.title: Join the Community
community.description: Ask questions, share experiences, and get tips from locals and fellow travelers in our vibrant travel community.

areas.title: Popular Japan Travel Destinations
areas.subtitle: Explore the best tourist attractions and hidden gems in Japan's most exciting regions

explore.title: Explore Diverse Areas
explore.description: From bustling Tokyo to serene Saitama, discover unique experiences in each region

discover.title: Discover Hidden Gems
discover.description: Find local favorites and off-the-beaten-path attractions recommended by experts

experience.title: Experience Authentic Japan
experience.description: Immerse yourself in local culture, cuisine, and traditions

tokyo.name: Tokyo
tokyo.title: Tokyo Travel Guide
tokyo.description: Japan's vibrant capital city where cutting-edge technology meets ancient traditions. Explore Shibuya, Asakusa, Ginza, Tokyo Skytree, and countless temples, museums, and world-class restaurants.

yokohama.name: Yokohama
yokohama.title: Yokohama Tourism
yokohama.description: International port city famous for Chinatown, Red Brick Warehouse, Minato Mirai skyline, and coastal attractions. Perfect for day trips from Tokyo.

saitama.name: Saitama
saitama.title: Saitama Attractions
saitama.description: Experience traditional Japan in Kawagoe's historic Edo-period streets and enjoy natural beauty in Chichibu. Great for cultural tourism and hiking.

chiba.name: Chiba
chiba.title: Chiba Travel
chiba.description: Home to Narita Airport, Tokyo Disneyland, and beautiful Boso Peninsula beaches. Combines theme parks, nature, and traditional Japanese culture.
